title: 03/05/21 DPS Hour 3 Ernie Johnson
itunes:title: 03/05/21 DPS Hour 3 Ernie Johnson
description:
Ernie Johnson tells Dan how he landed the host position at TNT. Ernie says that landing Charles Barkley was like landing the top free agent at the time.
